item.title: How to do continuous performance testing, with Lee Barnes (k6 Office Hours #26)
item.description:
Lee Barnes and I got connected because we are both speaking at TestCon Europe 2021 this year, and I thought it would be nice to have a chat with him before the conference to get a sneak peek at what he’s presenting about: continuous performance testing. Lee is the CEO of Utopia Solutions, and he’s been in the testing industry for decades, so I really appreciated his insights on where the industry is going.

Catch Lee’s talk here and mine here!
